name: 1template
description: New website steps // Have all Assets ready // Have layout and mark up visualized 1. npm Init: 2. npm install node-sass --save-dev 3. Add Script to compile scss  "compile:sass": "node-sass sass/main.scss css/style.css -w" 4. npm run compile:sass 5. Start with all mark up - BEM  6. style one section at a time -BEM 7. Add javascript 8. Back-End
author: dj
